activities: Personal information is transferred to Cybersettle in the United States from the E.U. when:  (1) Cybersettle's E.U. customers voluntarily give personal information to Cybersettle facilitators to settle insurance claim disputes and (2) when E.U. customers voluntarily participate in Cybersettle's promotional efforts, such as surveys.  Cybersettle noes not collect and/or transfer personal information from EU consumers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
